      • getTime

        public static Time getTime()
        Returns an instance of Time at current simulated time. It won't update anymore.
        Returns:
        Time instance at current simulated time

      • isAuto

        public static boolean isAuto()
        Returns auto parameter. If True, current simulated time is updated following actual current time.
        Returns:
        auto parameter
